abstract: A loss by Agnieszka Radwanska left the door open for Marion Bartoli to sneak past her and into the eighth and final spot at the year-end championships Istanbul.
snippet: A loss by Agnieszka Radwanska left the door open for Marion Bartoli to sneak past her and into the eighth and final spot at the year-end championships Istanbul.
lead_paragraph: Having just won the two biggest titles of her career back-to-back in Tokyo and Beijing, Agnieszka Radwanska needed just one more win to qualify directly for the year-end WTA Championships for the first time in her career.
